title: Divisibility Relation
text:
EnglishVietnameseGiven n positive integers. Your task is to select a maximum number of integers so that there are no two numbers a, b in which a is divisible by b.InputLine 1: n (1 ≤ n ≤ 200).Line 2: n positive integers a1, a2, ..., an(1 ≤ ai≤ 109).OutputLine 1: k, the maximum number of integers that can be selected.Line 2: k selected integers.ExampleInput8
1 2 3 5 6 8 7 9Output5
5 6 8 7 9Input4
2 3 2 3Output2
2 3
